requirements.summary: Create scripts/init_accountant.js to fetch agent Principal IDs from The_Orchestrator and initialize the accountant canister registry
acceptanceCriteria: The file `scripts/init_accountant.js` exists in the workspace under the `scripts/` directory.
The script connects to the IC and targets The_Orchestrator canister to query all 9 registered agent Principal IDs.
The script formats the retrieved principals into the array structure expected by accountant canister's initializeRegistry(agents) function.
The script calls initializeRegistry(agents) on the accountant canister.

file_operations.description: Create a Node.js script that uses @dfinity/agent and @dfinity/principal to connect to the IC, call The_Orchestrator canister's agent registry query to fetch all 9 agent Principal IDs, format them into the array structure expected by the accountant canister's initializeRegistry(agents) function, and call initializeRegistry(agents) on the accountant canister. The script must be write-only (not executed) and must not modify any existing files.
